channel.title: REVIEW:Garfield 2
channel.description: This is my first review guys,don't barrage me Movie name:garfield 2 Genre:humour,animation. comments:quite hilarious,but not to my expectation.Garfield comics are hilarious,but then this garfield movie is disapointing.Could be because they did not get Jim Davis to help them with the story I think.And for all you hardcore Garfield comic readers will question the director,because in this story liz actually likes jon,and in the comics they hardly go out on dates. Overall comments:Its worth watching,but don't expect too much. Overall rating:5-7.5/10

item.title: REVIEW:Garfield 2
item.dc:creator: @MoO MoO
item.description:
@MoO wrote:

My review would be like 1-2/10 lol i hated it with a passion!

The animals in the farm thing talk… (Like Garfield talking is cool and all but when every animal talks (cept odie) it gets really childish)

I would say, don’t see it. Waste of money and if u do wana still see it just torrent it.

Thanks, MoO

item.title: REVIEW:Garfield 2
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

The commercials looked terrible, they just tried to hard in my opinion. I havn’t seen either of the movies though, and wasn’t really planning to so its not a big loss. I’m a fan of the comics though

item.title: REVIEW:Garfield 2
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Aww that sucks. James Balooshi played Garfield too.

I read Garfield comics all through out elementary school. I got almost have all of Garfield Comics! Garfield 1 wasn’t that great either though, so I didn’t really expect much in the sequel since most sequels aren’t as good as the first one.

Read full topic

item.title: REVIEW:Garfield 2
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

This is my first review guys,don’t barrage me
Movie name:garfield 2
Genre:humour,animation.
comments:quite hilarious,but not to my expectation.Garfield comics are hilarious,but then this garfield movie is disapointing.Could be because they did not get Jim Davis to help them with the story I think.And for all you hardcore Garfield comic readers will question the director,because in this story liz actually likes jon,and in the comics they hardly go out on dates.
Overall comments:Its worth watching,but don’t expect too much.
Overall rating:5-7.5/10

Read full topic
